      • copulate

        public <A extends Mammal> void copulate(A bear,
                                        int turnNb)
        Performs a copulation between the current animal instance and the given animal (which must be the same)
        Specified by:
        copulate in interface Mammal
        Overrides:
        copulate in class Animal
        Type Parameters:
        A - Generic type used for the animals parameter, which is here a type extending Mammal
        Parameters:
        bear - The animal instance that represents the male
        turnNb - The current turn number, to mark the beginning of the pregnancy

      • checkBirth

        public Bear checkBirth(int turnNb)
        Checks if the pregnancy is at term
        Specified by:
        checkBirth in interface Mammal
        Parameters:
        turnNb - the current turn number
        Returns:
        The newly created animal if any, or null if no birth happened

      • birth

        public Bear birth()
        Represents the birth of the children
        Specified by:
        birth in interface Mammal
        Returns:
        A new Bear instance (through the AnimalFactory), which represents the newly born animal
